testcase.name: Admin login
testcase.system-out: * def requestPayload = read('classpath:src/test/resources/Payloads/loginPayload.json') . passed Given url baseUrl+'/v1/authentication' .................................... passed And request requestPayload ................................................ passed And headers {Content-Type: 'application/json', Connection: 'Keep-Alive'} .. passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def accessToken = response.token ........................................ passed * print 'access token is '+accessToken .................................... passed
